arts.ttl: Rodrigo Mora at the double as Porto beat Famalicão 2-1 at the Dragão
arts.sum: As if more evidence was needed of Rodrigo Mora’s star quality, the 17-year-old Porto star scored two more superb individual goals to propel the Dragons to a 2-1 victory over Famalicão this afternoon. Pedro Bondo pulled one back for the visitors to make it a nervous ending for the home team but Porto held on to leapfrog Braga into third place in the standings. Porto 2-1 Famalicão highlights Highlights to follow shortly
Portuguese outlet Espaço Portista has revealed the look of FC Porto's home kit for the 2025-26 season, celebrating 10 years of the club's partnership with New Balance.
